Package com.mohamed.capstonebankdemo.repository

Interface PaymentRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Payment,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Payment,Integer>
@Repository public interface PaymentRepository extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Payment,Integer>
This is the Payment Repository that helps inset values in the payments database

    • makePayment

      @Modifying @Query(value=" INSERT INTO payments(account_id, beneficiary, beneficiary_acc_no, amount, reference_no, status, reason_code, created_at) VALUES(:account_id,:beneficiary, :beneficiary_acc_no, :amount, :reference_no, :status, :reason_code, :created_at )", nativeQuery=true) void makePayment(@Param("account_id") int account_id, @Param("beneficiary") String beneficiary, @Param("beneficiary_acc_no") String beneficiary_acc_no, @Param("amount") double amount, @Param("reference_no") String reference_no, @Param("status") String Status, @Param("reason_code") String reason_code, @Param("created_at") LocalDateTime created_at)
